name: Temporal (freezyblanco)
description:
(Created as part of a game design course. I was only allowed to use a single triangle sprite, and a timpani sound effect)

Captain! There is a TEMPOral anomaly causing our ship to only move according to a mysterious drum beat! Aggressive space hazards are multiplying quickly and heading this way! We must quickly collect as many stars as we can before are destroyed by this cosmic danger!
